title: Merkel drops climate target to secure deal
text:
Merkel drops climate target to secure deal 12:09am IST - 01:11 
Germany's would-be coalition partners have pushed back an ambitious climate-change target in talks to form the next government. It could be an embarrassment to Merkel - an advocate of strict emissions cuts on the world stage - but she needs the deal after months of vacuum at the top.   
Germany's would-be coalition partners have pushed back an ambitious climate-change target in talks to form the next government. It could be an embarrassment to Merkel - an advocate of strict emissions cuts on the world stage - but she needs the deal after months of vacuum at the top.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/08/merkel-drops-climate-target-to-secure-de?videoId=381248282&videoChannel=117460
